data.text: @PWB_Global @DanielGriffinMD @profvrr The stats that Dr. Griffin quotes about pediatric deaths comes from the MMWR the COVID NET database which is a surveillance system collecting data from a network of 250 acute care hospitals in 14 states.
@PWB_Global @DanielGriffinMD @profvrr Yes i have listened to them all

@PWB_Global @profvrr @DanielGriffinMD Dr. Griffin, are those numbers for NYS or nationally? Omicron was 4x worse than Delta 1000/day hospitalized. 20 children deaths per day since Omicron peak. Thanks.

@PWB_Global @profvrr @DanielGriffinMD #saitama is releasing swap function on Saitamask (available on iOS and Google Play) today. This is big news in our community, so this could be very big. 

As always my crypto family, always do your own research before investing in any project.
